document.title: Technical Bulletins: Drinking from a Fire Hydrant: The Fire Department's Role in Protecting the Public Water System
document.abstract: A revised state regulation concerning fire hydrants is causing concern for fire department leaders, providers of public water supplies, and public health officials across the state of Tennessee. The new regulation is the final result of the 1996 Amendments to the Safe Drinking Water Act with the emphasis on contamination prevention.
